version_description:
- 隐藏转化前后没有变化的文字效果
- 新增 50 种文字效果

- 修复 iPad crash 的问题
- 增加一种新的文字效果

新年快乐，这个版本我们带来了以下更新：

- 增加多个新的文字特效
- 增加收藏文字特效功能
- 增加复制历史功能
- 增加黑色主题
- 增加快速清空输入框

-Fix purchase status save issues

Latest updates:
-Added multiple new text styles
-Added star text styles
-Added your copy history
-Added Black Theme
-Added quick empty input box

-Fix purchase status save issues
Latest updates:
-Added multiple new text styles
-Added star text styles
-Added your copy history
-Added Black Theme
-Added quick empty input box
Fix localization issue
- Added new text styles

- Added sPoNgE cAsE style

Inspired by Mocking Spongebob
-Support URL schemes, you can open Fancy Text by means of shortcuts, etc.
- Added Text Decorator

① Added URL Scheme explanation
② Part of the font supports sharing or watching a video to unlock
③ Fixed some bugs

Preview of the next version: keyboard

-Added keyboard features that can be added to the system's third-party keyboard and used anywhere
-Fix small caps font issues
-Some optimization
Happy new year, new year phrases are ready for you
- Fixed keyboard can't be installed issue when the system version is lower than 12.1

- Shorten the keyboard name
- Bug fixing

- Keyboard supports new fonts: upside down, SpongeBob
- A font with a numeric effect displays the number directly above the alphabet keyboard
- Bug fix

- Rearrange Effects for Better Usage.
- Delightful Scrolling Feedback.
- Fixed checking IAP state bug

- Bugfix: Globe button disappear in iOS 13.
- Bugfix: Star / Unstar refresh views.
- Bugfixes.

- Keyboard: Long press first row to input number.
- Keyboard: Long press globe button to show keyboard list.

- Fixed some bugs
